sense.gloss: opposition, rebellion, revolt, resistance, backlash, refusal
rebounding, recoiling, repulsion
rally (e.g. in stock prices), recovery
provocation, stirring up, arousal, excitement, stimulation
(a) jump
splashes (usu. of mud)

close (e.g. of a theatrical performance), breakup
plectrum (for a shamisen, biwa, etc.), pick
drumstick (for taiko), mallet (for a gong), beater
spring
spring (in one's legs), bounce
springboard, impetus
taking a cut (of someone else's money), taking a rake-off, pocketing a kickback, skimming (a percentage of the profits, proceeds, etc.)
to push aside, to thrust aside, to brush aside, to throw off, to shrug off (e.g. pressure)
to reject, to remove, to take out
to reject, to repulse, to repel
to bounce back, to counterattack, to strike back
bigeye tuna (edible fish, Thunnus obesus)
to send (something) flying, to splatter
to drive (something) off

sdata.j: ↑車↑↓くるま↓に↑撥↑↓は↓ねられるところだった。
sdata.e: I was nearly hit by a car.

sdata.j: その↑車↑↓くるま↓が↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑子↑↓こ↓を↑撥↑↓は↓ねた↑時↑↓とき↓、ちょうど↑居合↑↓いあ↓わせた。
sdata.e: I happened along when the car hit the boy.

sdata.j: ↑車↑↓くるま↓に↑撥↑↓は↓ねられるところだった。
sdata.e: I narrowly escaped being run over by a car.

sdata.j: ↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑車↑↓くるま↓に↑撥↑↓は↓ねられて、↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑手↑↓しゅ↓が↑車↑↓くるま↓で↑走↑↓はし↓り↑去↑↓さ↓った。
sdata.e: I saw the man knocked down and the driver driving away.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑通↑↓とお↓りを↑横切↑↓よこぎ↓っていて↑危↑↓あや↓うく↑車↑↓くるま↓に↑撥↑↓は↓ねられそうになった。
sdata.e: He was nearly hit by the car while crossing the street.

sdata.j: ↑撥↑↓は↓ね↑付↑↓つ↓けられるほどに↑増↑↓ま↓すわが↑思↑↓おも↓い。
sdata.e: The more she spurns my love, the more it grows.

sdata.j: ↑今朝↑↓けさ↓は↑髪↑↓かみ↓の↑毛↑↓け↓が↑撥↑↓は↓ねてるんだ。せめて↑手鏡↑↓てかがみ↓を↑貸↑↓か↓してくれ、そこの↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓しにしまってあるだろ。
sdata.e: My hair's messed up this morning. At least lend me a hand mirror - it should be shut in the drawer there.

sdata.j: ↑車↑↓くるま↓に↑撥↑↓は↓ねられるところだった。
sdata.e: I was almost hit by a car.
